# PLAN-G Entertainment

> PLAN-G Entertainment is an artist management company and IP studio where raw talent transforms into timeless art.

## Company Overview

- **Official Name**: PLAN-G Entertainment
- **Website**: https://plan-g.io/
- **Business**: Artist Management & IP Studio
- **Contact**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Phone**: 010-3369-2598

## Artists

### Gaho (가호)
- **Role**: Singer-Songwriter
- **Instagram**: https://www.instagram.com/ad_gaho
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/gaho_official
- **Spotify**: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3ybZTNrlK0QhL4rBxfLHOc
- **X (Twitter)**: https://x.com/gaho88882970
- **TikTok**: https://www.tiktok.com/@ad_gaho

## About

PLAN-G Entertainment is a music label dedicated to discovering authentic artists and maximizing their potential. We believe in the power of original artistry and innovative sound. We build deep connections between artists and fans, preserve the true essence of music, and open new possibilities.

From music production to global distribution, PLAN-G Entertainment stands alongside artists throughout their creative journey, becoming a steadfast partner to help their voices reach the world.

## Contact Information

- **Business Inquiries**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Press & Media**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Artist Management**: 010-3369-2598

This website is available in Korean (ko), English (en), and Spanish (es).
